mapper.select: select leftdb.reserve_no, leftdb.user_no, leftdb.reserve_sdate, leftdb.reserve_edate, leftdb.company_name, leftdb.roadname_address, leftdb.backoffice_image, p.payment_total from( select r.reserve_no, r.user_no,r.reserve_sdate, r.reserve_edate, b.company_name, b.roadname_address, b.backoffice_image from reserveinfo r left join backofficeinfo b on r.backoffice_no = b.backoffice_no ) leftdb left join paymentinfo p on leftdb.reserve_no = p.reserve_no where leftdb.user_no = #{user_no} AND sysdate <= leftdb.reserve_edate

select leftdb.reserve_no, leftdb.user_no, leftdb.reserve_sdate, leftdb.reserve_edate, leftdb.company_name, leftdb.roadname_address, leftdb.backoffice_image, p.payment_total from( select r.reserve_no, r.user_no,r.reserve_sdate, r.reserve_edate, b.company_name, b.roadname_address, b.backoffice_image from reserveinfo r left join backofficeinfo b on r.backoffice_no = b.backoffice_no ) leftdb left join paymentinfo p on leftdb.reserve_no = p.reserve_no where leftdb.user_no = #{user_no} AND sysdate > leftdb.reserve_edate

select c.comment_no, b.company_name as backoffice_name, r.room_name, c.comment_content, c.comment_date from backofficeinfo b right join comments c on c.backoffice_no = b.backoffice_no left join roominfo r on c.room_no = r.room_no where c.mother_no is null order by c.comment_no desc

select c.comment_no, b.company_name as backoffice_name, r.room_name, c.comment_content as answer_content, c.comment_date as answer_date from backofficeinfo b right join comments c on c.backoffice_no = b.backoffice_no left join roominfo r on c.room_no = r.room_no where c.mother_no = #{mother_no}

select r.reserve_no, b.company_name, r.room_type, r.reserve_sdate, r.reserve_edate, rm.room_name, rm.room_price, b.backoffice_name, b.roadname_address || b.detail_address as full_address, b.backoffice_tel, b.backoffice_email, p.payment_total, p.actual_payment, m.mileage_change from reserveinfo r left join backofficeinfo b on r.backoffice_no = b.backoffice_no left join roominfo rm on r.room_no = rm.room_no left join paymentinfo p on r.reserve_no = p.reserve_no left join mileage m on p.mileage_no = m.mileage_no where r.reserve_no = #{reserve_no}
select user_no, user_name, user_tel, user_email from userinfo where user_no = #{user_no}
